FIVE LAYERS OF COMFORT. Soft & airy top layer of quilted cooling tencel mattress cover. Second layer of gel memory foam to distribute your weight. Add in an adaptive response transition layer that provides support to avoid the feeling of sinking into quicksand. Backed with a base layer to reinforce support. At the very bottom is a mattress cover to ensure that mattress slippage is not an issue!

IDEAL SUPPORT FOR ANY POSITION. Optimal level of firmness, coolness, breathability, and comfort. Nectar molds to your body, relieving all your aches and pains. It is firm enough to support you, but soft enough to be gentle where you're sensitive. Even on those 90° nights, Nectar sleeps cool, gently regulating heat for an ideal temperature all night long.
NECTAR FOREVER WARRANTY. We guarantee Nectar for as long as you own the mattress. Longest warranty in the business (we checked).

ranklist.title: TUFT & NEEDLE - Original Queen Adaptive Foam Mattress, CertiPUR-US, 100-Night Trial

PROPRIETARY FOAM - Our T&N Adaptive foam is engineered based on customer feedback and provides pressure relief where you need it most. An open-cell structure provides a flexible sleep surface that adjusts to you as you move throughout the night

FREE OF HARMFUL CHEMICALS - Our mattresses are GREENGUARD Gold and CertiPUR-US certified, this means our beds are held to the highest of standards and are third party tested and certified to free of harmful chemicals, substances or materials

ranklist.title: CHITA Memory Foam Mattress,Twin Size 11 Inches Mattress,Gel-Infused,Fiberglass Free Mattress,Mattress in a Box,CertiPUR-US Certified,100-Night Trial
contents: 【FIVE LAYERS OF COMFORT】 (1) Top layer of Ice cooling fabric mattress cover; (2) 3" Gel memory foam and ice cooling cover collaborate to add breathability and coolness; (3) 2" Transition layer to support your weight and avoid subsidence;(4)6" Basic layer to strengthen support;(5)Mattress cover to ensure that the mattress will not slip! 【ICE COOLING FABRIC COVER】Cooling Fabric Exclusive at CHITA – Unlike the so-called breathable cover (usually made of 100% of polyester) commonly used in the mattress industry, 45% of our mattress cover is composed of cooling particles.The surface is smooth and breathable.
【3" GEL-INFUSED MEMORY FOAM】The 3" thick gel layer is thicker than ordinary mattresses. Cooling memory foam and ice cooling cover collaborate to add breathability and coolness

【FIBERGLASS FREE】Our Fiberglass Free FR inner sock replaces traditional fireproof materials that contain fiberglass. The health of customers is always the first priority, and we use higher costs to care for the health of customers.

【MATTRESS IN A BOX】Mattress ships compressed, rolled, and shipped in a box conveniently delivered to your door for easy set-up. Simply open the box, unfold mattress, and the mattress will expand to its original shape within 72 hours.
